channel.title: Basic Music Player
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]Basic Music Player[/b][/size]
This is a very very basic music player to mainly show what you can do with my library/how to use it. And in case you want to build this out. It's nothing special but maybe somebody is interested. The used library can be found here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663680.0.html]MP3 Player API[/url]
[url=http://up.ht/1nixuGh]Download source files[/url]
[size=14pt][b]Media:[/b][/size]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/1iir7b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2lnfp95.png[/img]

item.title: Basic Music Player
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:10, topic:544826”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=663704.msg4436210#msg4436210 date=1405131677]

You need a back button. Maybe a time stamp and other basic features lol
[/quote]As if you’d ever want to listen to the same track again.

I actually do that quite a bit. Listen to a song and get caught up on it over and over.[/quote]Nah, I was just kidding.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:

You need a back button. Maybe a time stamp and other basic features lol
[/quote]As if you’d ever want to listen to the same track again.[/quote]
I actually do that quite a bit. Listen to a song and get caught up on it over and over.

item.title: Basic Music Player
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:3, topic:544826”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=663704.msg4435729#msg4435729 date=1405022255]
Does it read any of the mp3’s tags? (The ID2/3 tags)
Maybe include a feature to build/save playlists?
[/quote]
It’s mainly just to show how to work with the library I wrote.
Other features will only come if I find time to work on this since it’s not primary right now.[/quote]“What a great idea! When I find the time, I’ll totally work on ideas like that.” would have been better to hear !

Good work doe

Read full topic

item.title: Basic Music Player
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:544826”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=663704.msg4435730#msg4435730 date=1405022713]

Does it read any of the mp3’s tags? (The ID2/3 tags)
Maybe include a feature to build/save playlists?

It’s mainly just to show how to work with the library I wrote.
Other features will only come if I find time to work on this since it’s not primary right now.
[/quote]
Well I mean, the library you wrote could always contain ID2/ID3 tag reading.[/quote]
No it doesn’t, I didn’t even think about that, I just take the file name now.

Read full topic

Does it read any of the mp3’s tags? (The ID2/3 tags)
Maybe include a feature to build/save playlists?
[/quote]
It’s mainly just to show how to work with the library I wrote.

This is a very very basic music player to mainly show what you can do with my library/how to use it.
